title: Murphy's Law
description: The Regulator Series (Book 2) Murphyâ€™s plans for semi-retirement with his newfound love are put on hold with one call from his boss, William Burke, special assistant to the president. Counterfeit money turning up in banks all across the west could threaten the American economy. Leaving Sally at his Washington home, Murphy sets out to pick up the trail of his quarry.
author: Ethan J. Wolfe
